description:
### Description:
Preview is not showing the default value(in drop-down fields)of required fields until they are changed to some other value.


### Steps to Reproduce:
Create any of the stated forms. Fill all the required fields and don't change the default values in the drop downs of required fields.

### Expected Behaviour:
The default value should be displayed in the preview.

### Actual Behaviour:
The default value is not displayed in the preview.

### How to Submit
Submit a pull request linking to the issue and include the link to the pull request in your submission through the GCI Portal.

**Note:** Please specify atleast two forms that you will be correcting as part of this task in a comment at the GCI Portal and the linked issue.

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/community-app).
name: Mifos X Community App - Bug Fix: Preview is not showing the default value (in drop down fields) of required fields
